The correct answer is C: [00:06:25 - 00:06:43]. 

In the provided audio clip, the teacher begins by welcoming students to the unit on forces and motion. They then proceed to discuss friction and breaking, using the example of a car driving past and the need to brake suddenly. A whiteboard drawing of a car and a cat is also shown during this part of the lesson. There is no mention of a tire-like squeak sound occurring at any point in the audio clip.
The moment the speaker explicitly states the lesson's learning goal is at (00:00:55). The complete statement is 'our unit on forces and motion today will be about friction and breaking.'
